title: Snake Colors
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: What colors can snakes be? Snake Colors uses photographs to show the various colors found on these scaly creatures. Use this book to teach students about asking and answering questions as well as finding details to support the main idea.
meta: black, blue, green, orange, pink, red, snake, white, yellow
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /r/ sound
Complete Sentences : Recognize and use complete sentences
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word this

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
